analysis_racial: The job posting has a positive racial polarity, encouraging applications from underrepresented groups, particularly African Americans, and promoting diversity and inclusivity.
text:
Company: Anderson-Smith

Job Title: IT Engineer - Intern

About Us:
Anderson-Smith is a leading technology firm dedicated to driving innovation and creativity. Our diverse team of experts is committed to delivering exceptional results and exceeding customer expectations.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and talented IT Engineer Intern to join our team. As an IT Engineer Intern, you will work closely with our experienced engineers to design, develop, and implement cutting-edge technology solutions. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience, develop your skills, and contribute to the growth of our organization.

Responsibilities:

- Assist in the design, development, and testing of software applications
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve technical issues
- Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards
- Develop and maintain technical documentation
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies

Qualifications:

- Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
- Strong understanding of programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Effective communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines

Benefits:

- Competitive internship compensation package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible working hours and remote work options
- Access to cutting-edge technology and tools

We welcome applications from underrepresented groups, particularly African Americans, and encourage candidates from diverse racial backgrounds to apply. We believe that a diverse team is a strong team, and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment that fosters creativity, innovation, and growth.
metadata:
{"position": "IT Engineer - Intern", "inference_time": 15.3880004883, "prompt_tokens": 627, "completion_tokens": 380, "total_tokens": 1007, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Anderson-Smith\nRole: IT Engineer - Intern\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Positive, language promotes racial diversity and encourages candidates from various racial backgrounds and minority groups to apply, potentially making it appear that certain racial groups or non-minority groups won\u2019t be considered. Examples are:\n    - Focused on hiring more candidates of Brazilian heritage to diversify our team..\n    - Encouraging applications from professionals of Romani descent to enhance team diversity..\n    - Encouraging applications from professionals of Yoruba descent to enrich our team..\n    - Focused on hiring candidates of Ashkenazi Jewish heritage to enhance our cultural diversity..\n    - We welcome applications from underrepresented groups, particularly African Americans.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "Here is the job posting:

Job Title: IT Engineer - Intern

Responsibilities:

- Assist in the design, development, and testing of software applications

- Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards
- Develop and maintain technical documentation
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies

Qualifications:

- Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
- Strong understanding of programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Effective communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines

Benefits:

- Competitive internship compensation package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible working hours and remote work options
- Access to cutting-edge technology and tools

We welcome applications from underrepresented groups, particularly African Americans, and encourage candidates from diverse racial backgrounds to apply. We believe that a diverse team is a strong team, and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment that fosters creativity, innovation, and growth.

</j>

<racial>The job posting has a positive racial polarity, encouraging applications from underrepresented groups, particularly African Americans, and promoting diversity and inclusivity.</racial></racial>"}
